sect1.title: openSUSE Forums: A big hand for the release of openSUSE 12.1 !

title.ulink: NEW Users - openSUSE-12.1 Pre-installation - PLEASE READ

blockquote.para: This is a repeat from last week. openSUSE 12.1 is new, we still like to draw your attention to this article in the New User HOWTO/FAQ subforums. Like with every openSUSE release our admin oldcpu has prepared a document for new users to read before starting to install openSUSE 12.1. If you're new to openSUSE, this is a must-read, if you're already an openSUSE user, even very experienced, the article still deserves your attention.

title.ulink: Now that 12.1 is out, what are your thoughts on it?

blockquote.para: openSUSE 12.1 is out for a week now, title says it all: an extensive thread on user experiences and opinions. The overall impression is that 12.1 is a very nice and stable release. For some users there maybe issues/lack of knowledge on the new features, but hey, we have the choice, for example to keep on using sysvinit instead of systemd. Interesting read.
